title: PlayStation State of Play March 2022 Kinda Funny Live Reactions
description:
Go to http://upstart.com/KINDAFUNNY to find out how much Upstart can lower your monthly payments!

Go to http://expressvpn.com/kindafunny to get an extra 3 months of ExpressVPN FREE!

Sign up at http://chime.com/kfgames to make your first good decision of the new year!

Go to http://babbel.com and use promo code KINDAFUNNY to get 3 months FREE!

The boys react to the latest announcements from PlayStation.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
